tasks.title: Implement Backend API for Prompt Enhancement
tasks.description: Develop the `/api/enhance` endpoint using tRPC and Next.js, integrating with OpenAI and Anthropic for prompt enhancement.
tasks.details: Create a tRPC router with an `enhance` procedure accepting `{ prompt: string, model?: string }`. Integrate OpenAI and Anthropic APIs via an abstract provider layer. Ensure LLM-agnostic switching based on the `model` parameter. Return `{ enhanced: string }`.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit test API with mock LLM responses. Integration test with real OpenAI/Anthropic endpoints. Validate error handling and response format.

subtasks.title: Set Up tRPC in Next.js Project
subtasks.description: Install required dependencies and configure tRPC within the Next.js backend, including strict mode and input validation setup.
subtasks.details:
Install @trpc/server, @trpc/client, @trpc/react-query, @trpc/next, and zod. Enable strict mode in tsconfig.json. Initialize tRPC backend and create a basic router structure.
<info added on 2025-09-16T09:16:45.924Z>
Add the following files and implement the provider abstraction for LLMs:

- apps/server/src/services/llm/types.ts: Define the LLMProvider interface with an enhance(prompt: string, options?: ProviderOptions) method, and ProviderOptions type with optional model property.
- apps/server/src/services/llm/openai.ts: Implement OpenAIProvider using fetch, reading OPENAI_API_KEY from environment. If missing, throw a typed TRPCError('INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR') with a clear message. The enhance method should call the OpenAI API and return { enhanced }.
- apps/server/src/services/llm/anthropic.ts: Implement AnthropicProvider using fetch, reading ANTHROPIC_API_KEY from environment. If missing, throw a typed TRPCError('INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR') with a clear message. The enhance method should call the Anthropic API and return { enhanced }.
- apps/server/src/services/llm/index.ts: Export selectProvider(model?: string) that chooses the provider based on model prefix ("gpt" for OpenAI, "claude" for Anthropic), with a default provider fallback.

Edit the router to add the enhance mutation:

- apps/server/src/routers/index.ts: Add an enhance mutation with input validated by z.object({ prompt: z.string().min(1), model: z.string().optional() }). On call, select the provider using selectProvider(model), invoke provider.enhance(prompt, { model }), and return { enhanced }.

- Ensure all functions are verbose and readable, following TypeScript best practices.
- Expect environment variables OPENAI_API_KEY and ANTHROPIC_API_KEY to be set.

- Testing will be handled in a later subtask.

subtasks.title: Implement Abstract Provider Layer for LLMs

subtasks.title: Integrate OpenAI and Anthropic APIs

subtasks.title: Implement tRPC Enhance Procedure

subtasks.title: Write Unit and Integration Tests for API

tasks.title: Develop Web Playground Frontend

tasks.details: Implement a UI with two text areas (raw and enhanced), an 'Enhance' button, and preview/accept/replace workflow. Connect to the backend `/api/enhance` endpoint via tRPC. Ensure minimal UI footprint and responsive design.

subtasks.title: Design Responsive UI Layout

subtasks.details: Ensure the layout adapts to different screen sizes and maintains a clean, accessible design. Use the app directory and component organization best practices for scalability.

subtasks.title: Implement Preview, Accept, and Replace Functionality

subtasks.title: Conduct End-to-End and UI Snapshot Testing
